Based on the comment, there is no strict preference expressed for either Option A (Carnegie Mellon University) or Option B (University of Maryland). The author of the comment provides several cautionary points regarding assuming that Advanced Placement (AP) credit will make it easy to graduate early, and advises against relying on getting a Undergraduate Student Instructor (UGSI) job at the University of California, Berkeley (UCB) for Computer Science 61A as a sophomore. Therefore, the appropriate response would be:

"No preference."
